title: ZIG Wallet
successFeeTooltip: Pay the success fees of any Profit Sharing Service with ZIG and get a discount on the amount to pay.
tradingFeeTooltip: Zignaly will return the whole trading fees of your new trades in USDT to your account and will charge you the equivalent amount minus the discount in ZIG.
savingMoney: You are SAVING MONEY with ZIG!
